awe6.core.ASession

type
class
implements
awe6.interfaces.ISession
The ASession class provides a minimalist abstract implementation of the ISession interface.

It is intended as an abstract class to be extended.

For API documentation please review the corresponding Interfaces.

Static Variables

DEBUG_ID(inline,null) : String

Constructor

new(kernel : awe6.interfaces.IKernel, ?id : String)
